entry.title: Colour Changing Permanent Vinyl - Styletech
entry.summary:
Vendor: Tape Technologies
Type: Styletech Colour Changing Vinyl
Price: 7.50

Color Changing Vinyl


Introducing the Styletech colour changing vinyl!  The colour of the vinyl will change  based on temperature.

Cold Blue vinyl changes from white to blue when exposed to cold.

Red Hot Yellow changes from Red to Yellow when exposed to heat.

entry.title: 651 Equivalent Adhesive Vinyl (Styletech 4000) - BUNDLES of 44 colours
entry.summary:
Vendor: Tape Technologies
Type: Styletech ADH 651
Price: 35.00 - 63.85 (2 variants)

This listing is for bundles only..  If you are looking for rolls (1, 5 and 10 yards) or sheets, please consult the different listings.

BUY A BUNDLE AND AUTOMATICALLY SAVE 10% off the regular price. In these bundles, you get the full set of 43 colours and pay 40% less than Oracal 651 for an equivalent quality product.

3 MIL Intermediate Vinyl - up to 6 Year (.08 MM)Styletechtm V-4000 Series - A 651 equivalent permanent adhesive vinyl with savings of 30% on sheets and more as the sizes go up. 

The Styletech Series 4000 adhesive vinyl is a permanent intermediate vinyl available in 43 colours that is equivalent to Oracal 651 but at a fraction of the price. It is softer than other calendared products and provide you with the highest gloss available in the industry today. This vinyl has lower shrinkage and better color stability than other intermediate films resulting in up to 6 year durability in some colors.

entry.title: Styletech Glitter FX - Permanent Adhesive Vinyl
entry.summary:
Vendor: Tape Technologies
Type: Styletech FX Glitter
Price: 2.97 - 75.06 (33 variants)

Our Styletech Ultra Glitter FX collection of adhesive vinyl provides you with a unique metalized look in the hottest colours.  We offer you 11 colours in 3 different sizes. All colours are also available in bundles at a discounted price.

Finish: High Gloss Glitter with 3D effect

Thickness:  2 mil.

Adhesive:  Permanent, Solvent based

Outdoor durability: 5+ years

Waterproof: Hand wash recommended; do not soak in hot water

**Product size may vary by up to 1/4 inch.

The Ultra Glitter FX vinyl has a permanent adhesive. It is compatible with all personal hobby and craft cutters and can be used in many applications including windows, car decals, signs or anything that needs a little sparkle. It can be used indoors but is water proof and weather resistant making it an ideal craft vinyl choice for outdoor applications as well.

Features

Compatible with all craft cutters such as: Cricut, Silhouette, Xyron, Craft ROBO, Graphtec, Quickutz, Inspirations, Pazzles, etc.

s:variant.title: 12"x 1 yard / FX GLITTER Bundle - All 10 colours (July 2021)

These decorative films allow you to bring color, visual effects and graphics patterns to glass or any transparent surface. They have uniform color and are available in White, Blue, Green, Pink, Pearl and Grey.

entry.title: Styletech - Transfer Tape
entry.summary:
Vendor: Tape Technologies
Type: Styletech Transfer Tape
Price: 0.95 - 19.50 (6 variants)

You don't want to invest in a huge roll of transfer tape?  We have a few options for you.

The Styletech transfer tape is a mid to high tack tape that works beautifully.  No more overly sticky tape that won't come off or tape that just won't stick.  These rolls come are 12" wide by 30 feet long.  Note that you can reuse your tape many times.  

We have 3 different options available: 

- Clear with a grid printed right onto the tape (not recommended for wet applications).

- Clear with a paper protective sheet.  The grids are not on the tape but on the paper sheet (not recommended for wet applications).

- A paper tape that is good for both wet and dry applications.

s:variant.title: Clear with grid on Tape - 12"x30 feet roll
Clear tape with grid and liner - 12"x 30 feet roll
Clear no grid, no backing - 12"x 30 feet roll
Clear tape with grid and liner - 1 yard x 12"
Clear tape with grid and liner - 12"x12" sheet

entry.title: Chalkboard Adhesive Vinyl - Styletech
entry.summary:
Vendor: Tape Technologies
Type: Styletech Adhesive Vinyl
Price: 3.00 - 8.50 (2 variants)

The Styletech Chalkboard Film is a 5 mil adhesive non-PVC film that is perfect for bringing organization and adding creativity to the class room. Just cut to shape, peel, and stick. Blackboard vinyl applies to any flat, smooth, and clean surface.

Features:

  • Easy to Cut
  • Easy to Install
  • Easy to Write On
  • Easy to Clean
Applications Ideas:
  • Restaurant and Kitchen Menu Boards
  • Children's Play Areas
  • Family Calendar
  • Shopping Lists
  • Craft Projects

NOTE:  the real size of sheet is 11 3/4 and 23 1/2.  These sizes may vary slightly

Do you need a larger size?  Contact us.

 

We have included a chart in the images providing cutting directions for the various cutters.

entry.title: Fluorescent Adhesive Vinyl - Styletech
entry.summary:
Vendor: Tape Technologies
Type: Styletech Adhesive Vinyl
Price: 3.25 - 48.60 (21 variants)

The Styletech fluorescent adhesive vinyl is recommended for interior applications but will provide short term durability if applied vertically outdoors. These colours, although not "Glow in the Dark" provide high visibility in daylight conditions, but are particularly eye-catching at dawn, dusk or at times when visibility is poor.  

Outdoor durability is up to 6 months based upon vertical exposure and applications.

We have included a chart in the images providing cutting directions for the various cutters.

entry.title: Ultra Metallic Glitter Adhesive Vinyl (Styletech 2000) - BUNDLES ONLY
entry.summary:
Vendor: Tape Technologies
Type: Styletech Ultra Metallic
Price: 25.90 - 204.75 (7 variants)

This listing is for bundles only.  If you are looking for sheets or rolls, please consult the other listings. 

*****

Buy a bundle, save a bundle!  When purchasing a bundle, you save 10% from the regular price.  

Please include your colour selection (colour names and numbers) for the Make your Own Dozen bundle in the "Notes to Seller" box contained in your order form.  Failing to provide us your choices will likely result in processing delays.  

Bundles may contain a few repeated choices but must have a good mix of colours.  

******

We have the largest selection of adhesive glitter vinyl colours and sizes in Canada. This line offers you 26 different shades.

This permanent vinyl is 2 mil thick and has an amazing surface gloss and colour depth.  Can be used in marine, automotive, wood and glass applications.

It has a durability of up to 5 years when properly applied. Shelf life is approximately 1 year under controlled climate conditions of  23C degrees and 50% relative humidity.

A chart showing cutting settings is included in the product images.

Sheet sizes may vary by + or - 1/4 inch due to cutting and production.

entry.title: Styletech Transparent Adhesive Glitter - BUNDLES
entry.summary:
Vendor: Tape Technologies
Type: Transparent glitter
Price: 32.50 - 157.35 (7 variants)

This listing is for bundles only.  If you are looking for sheets or rolls, please consult the other listing. 

*****

Buy a bundle, save a bundle!  When purchasing a bundle, you save 10% from the regular price.

Please include your colour selection (colour names and numbers) for the Make your Own Dozen bundle in the "Notes to Seller" box contained in your order form.  Failing to provide us your choices will likely result in processing delays.  

Bundles may contain a few repeated choices but must have a good mix of colours.  

******

Styletech Transparent Glitter Film can be easily cut and applied allowing you to turn and flat or slightly curved glass into a work of art. You can add sparkling color and privacy, creating an entirely new environment of light, space and visual effects.

This film is especially useful for glassware as it gives you a vibrant color on the outside and a silvery color from the inside. It can also be used to create amazing mozaic and stained glass effects. 
Available in 20 different shades, this glittery vinyl is considered permanent. 
A chart showing cutting settings is included in the images.

s:variant.title: 12"x 1 yard / Make your Own Dozen Bundle

entry.title: Styletech Transparent Adhesive Glitter (Sheets and rolls)
entry.summary:
Vendor: Tape Technologies
Type: Transparent glitter
Price: 3.00 - 8.75 (60 variants)

Styletech Transparent Glitter Film can be easily cut and applied allowing you to turn any flat or slightly curved glass into a work of art. You can add sparkling color and privacy, creating an entirely new environment of light, space and visual effects.
This film is especially useful for glassware as it gives you a vibrant color on both the outside and inside.  It can also be used to create amazing mozaic and stained glass effects. 
Available in 19 different shades, this glittery vinyl is considered permanent. 
A chart showing cutting settings is included in the images.

entry.title: Glow in the Dark Adhesive Vinyl
entry.summary:
Vendor: Tape Technologies
Type: Styletech Adhesive Vinyl
Price: 6.50 - 18.75 (3 variants)

The Styletech Glow in the Dark vinyl absorbs light and automatically glows in the dark for at least 4 hours once fully charged.  It will adhere to most plastic, wood, metal, concrete, plaster and painted surfaces. It is reliable for 4 + hours of visibility.  It is not recommended for exterior applications and not intended for application to complex curved, corrugated or riveted surfaces When properly processed and applied, this product may remain highly effective for up to 6 years.

No radioactive materials are used in the manufacturing of this product and it may be safely disposed of in a sanitary landfill.

This is a 9 to 11 mils film with a light yellow/green glossy appearance

A document showing cutting settings is included in the images.

Note:  Size may vary by + or - 1/4 inch due to manufacturing processes.

entry.title: Styletech Chrome - Permanent Adhesive Vinyl
entry.summary:
Vendor: Tape Technologies
Type: Styletech Chrome
Price: 3.50 - 64.50 (27 variants)

We offer you 7 colours from the Styletech Chrome Collection. This vinyl will add elegance and create stunning effects on glassware and windows.  

Note that a thin liner of silicone is added by the manufacturer to protect the surface from scratching during manipulation (with the excepyion of the holographic colour).  Don't forget to remove it when you are done to expose the amazing brilliancy of the chrome. 

Specifications

These products have a higher luster and light reflectivity that is achieved by utilizing ultra high clarity polyester in the manufacturing process. 

A unique high temperature acrylic adhesive also adds to the product's high performance. The release paper is balance formulated to the adhesive for best cutting and weeding.

Face Film: 2 mil polyester films, metalized so the color shows through with the polyester surface.

Adhesive: 1 mil clear, permanent acrylic based pressure sensitive adhesive which allows bonding to a smooth, clean, wax-free surface.

Durability:  2 years outdoors.  Gold is not recommended for exterior applications.

 *Product size may vary by up to 1/4 inch.

s:variant.title: 12"x1 yard / CH07 Arc en ciel (Holo) / Rainbow (Holo)
